description:
Configurable retention policies that automatically archive or delete old solve runs, research outputs, and logs from data/user based on age, size, or usage patterns. Optional cloud backup before deletion.

**Rationale:** data/user grows indefinitely with every session, consuming disk space. Users must manually identify and delete old files. Automated cleanup maintains storage hygiene without repetitive file management.
title: Automated Cleanup of Stale Outputs and Logs
